channel.title: [Gmod Vid] Fallout Roleplay ~ 2 Years Later.
channel.description:
2 years ago, I made a video for a Fallout Roleplay server, (DarkRP modified) and was asked to create a video for it.
2 years ago, I had a shitty laptop and only one week experience with After Effects, so I was going through my YouTube playlist and came across this old video. I decided to remake it today, and it's taken 5 hours in total.
[noparse]Original (2008): [/noparse][url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RjaUhRZloI0[/url]
New (2010): [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YGytpWhNCzw[/url]
Views, comments and CnC welcome. :3

item.title: [Gmod Vid] Fallout Roleplay ~ 2 Years Later.
item.dc:creator: Patonki
item.description:
majority of the video is showcasing how bad the half-life 2 AI is, by dwelling on the boring and monotone NPC combat.
is this video you whipped up in 5 hours really worth it’s own thread?

ps.
at least you aren’t using default videocopilot shit like in the original one

Read full topic

item.title: [Gmod Vid] Fallout Roleplay ~ 2 Years Later.
item.dc:creator: Savant
item.description:
too long and it was nothing else than playing with that catmull rom camera and a bit with the 1st person camera

maximally 1 minute, with interesting parts, different camera angles and fov, slight colour correction, less NPCs, music with more bass, gunfire sounds a bit enhanced, DoF, maybe a bit bloom (from postprocessing)
but yeah, creating a quality gmod movie takes either a lot of creativity, or a lot of time spent in front of pc screen, not 5 hours

Read full topic
